IDEA-Research/X-Pose

Detects any keypoints on images

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Unified vision model for open-world object detection
  • VGGT is a neural network that predicts 3D scene attributes like camera parameters, depth, and point maps from images
  • Monitors posture via webcam and sends notifications
  • 3D markerless kinematics from 2D videos
  • curated computer vision resources, papers, tools, datasets
  • whole-body pose estimation with two-stage distillation, supports multiple models and integration with ControlNet
  • Runs computer vision models locally to monitor nature
  • video and image watermarking code for training and inference
  • Person and body-part segmentation model
  • toolkit for computer vision tasks like detection, tracking, and dataset handling
